column4: i have 2 gigs of ram. after a few days of running my machine reports I have some 300-400 megs of ram
when i run the free command
any idea why my ram just disappears?
its a good thing that ram is being used
it's my total ram that's being reported wrong
i'm looking at the right number here
what is your total ram being reported as
up - so under "total" you've got 300 meg
it would be a mega fight
yeah, i've been twidling with xinerama without much luck.
